Cocoa Powder is a historical basic [[Resource|resource]] in the game. It was introduced with the [[Valentines Day 2018]] event and was removed from the game with the end of the event. It was one of the ingredients used to craft [[Cake|cakes]].

=Properties=
For droprate research please consult [[Talk:{{PAGENAME}}]].
